h1. How to backup eXo

eXo instance backup involves backing up the databases and the filesystems for index and value storage.
JCR backup should be done off-line. All datas under gatein/data should be backuped. Use this tar command : 

{screen}tar cvjf gatein-backup.tar.bz gatein/data{screen}

SQL backup should use RDBMS tools, it will depend on engine. Example: mysqldump on MySQL
